_header: I was long time one of the company
Subjects: On the Company of Lovers; lovers, advice to; envoys
_description:
On the Company of Lovers, translated from the French of Charles d’Orléans (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 124) — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
I Was long tyme oon of the companyOf loue and ware my tyme of
                    lustynes…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Nor thus biwayle my lijf in hevynesThat all is broke and newe
                    to make ayen
BLHar682.Editions:
